Key Match Events: Jamal Musiala scored the opening goal for Germany after 22 minutes
Manuel Neuer made a spectacular double-save to deny Hungary an equalizer
Maximilian Mittelstädt delivered a cross for Ilkay Gündogan to score the second goal for Germany
Post-Match Reflections: Julian Nagelsmann praised Jamal Musiala's performance
Ilkay Gündogan praised Musiala's contributions to the team's offense
Miscellaneous Highlights: Stuttgart provided a strong case for being Germany's home stadium
The atmosphere in Stuttgart was described as loud and emotional
Others: Germany have won their two opening games of a Euros tournament for the first time since 2012
The last time Germany had beaten Hungary was back in 2016
